p: (1) Inhibition of Protein Denaturation. Based on the results of this study, Combretin A and B effectively inhibited protein denaturation caused by heat. Table 1 thus shows a significant ( p < 0.001) inhibition of 63.93% and 87.78%, respectively, for Combretin A and B while diclofenac sodium at 1000 μg/mL produced an inhibition of 89.20%.
